title: It's a great time to move to IMT Hyland Hills! Newly renovated
posting_body: ['1 Bedroom  1 Bathroom | 718 sq ft | $1975/Month', 'IMT Hyland Hills', '4901 W 93rd Ave', 'Westminster, CO 80031', 'show contact info', 'Description:', '**Walk-ins welcome & choose from 3 tour options.', '**', 'Overlooking the Hyland Hills golf course, mountain views, shopping and dining that symbolizes the city around us.', 'Westminster is a new architectural marker for a unique lively neighborhood.', 'With so much going on in this area, IMT Hyland Hills is your perfect place to call home.', 'Take a Virtual Tour of Our Property Today!', '<URL>', 'Apartment Amenities:', '− Cable Ready', '− Central Air Conditioning', '− Gas Fireplaces In Select Units', '− In-Home Washer/ Dryer', '− Mountain, Pool or Golf Course Views In Select Units', '− Nine-Foot, Vaulted Ceilings In Select Units', '− Private Patio/Balcony', '− Private Storage Available', 'In Select Units', '− Walk-In Closets', '− Wood-Style Flooring in Living Areas In Select Units', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '− Cabana Pool', '− Clubhouse Pool & Spa', '− IMT Active', '− IMT CoWork', '− IMT Pets Park', '− Outdoor Pavilion', '− Recycling', '− 15 Minutes from Denver & Boulder', '− 24/7 Emergency Maintenance Service', '− 24-Hour Package Lockers', '− Attached & Detached Garages Available', '− Barbecue & Fire Pit Area', '− Minutes from Interlocken & FlatIron Crossing', '− My IMT Resident Portal with Online & On-Site Kiosk Access: Utilities Connection, Rent Payment, Service Requests, Account Information & Community Postings', 'Additional Details:', 'Deposit: Call', 'Terms: 3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Pets: Allowed: Two pet maximum.', 'One Pet: $35 pet rent & $350 non-refundable fee.', 'Two Pets: $45 pet rent & $500 non-refundable fee.', 'No weight restriction.', 'Some breed restrictions apply.', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '25B4DD83615A4FB']
